column1: 1. Grüezi - Hello
2. Merci vilmal - Thank you very much
3. Wie gaht's? - How are you?
4. Guet, und dir? - Good, and you?
5. Es het no Plätz - There's still room
6. Es isch guet gsi - It was good
7. Mach's guet - Take care
8. Was machsch hüt? - What are you doing today?
9. Mir gönd go... - We're going to...
10. Hesch Lust, mit z'cho? - Do you want to come with?
11. Es isch nöd schlimm - It's not bad
12. Mir chönd go... - We can go...
13. Es isch schön gsi - It was nice
14. Mir gfallt das guet - I like that
15. Gern gscheh - You're welcome
16. I ha kei Ahnig - I have no idea
17. Mir händ kei Ziit meh - We don't have any more time
18. Das isch scho okay - That's okay
19. Mir gsehnd üs gli - See you soon
20. Das isch eifach - That's easy
21. Was gsehts? - What's up?
22. S'isch nöd dr Hammer - It's not great
23. Mir händs geschafft - We did it
24. Was empfiehlsch? - What do you recommend?
25. Es isch nid so wichtig - It's not so important
26. Es git kei Problem - There's no problem
27. Das passt guet - That's fine
28. Mir chönds morn mache - We can do it tomorrow
29. Das isch super - That's great
30. S'isch e chline Wält - It's a small world
31. Mir münd jetz go - We have to go now
32. Das isch nid eifach - That's not easy
33. Was hesch für Interesse? - What are your interests?
34. S'isch alles klar - Everything is clear
35. Es isch kei Problem - It's no problem
36. Das isch sehr guet - That's very good
37. Mir freued eus - We're looking forward to it
38. S'isch e langi Gschicht - It's a long story
39. Das isch e chline Welt - It's a small world
40. Mir mache das morn - We'll do that tomorrow
41. Das isch nöd eifach - That's not easy
42. Was empfiehlsch mir? - What do you recommend to me?
43. S'isch alles guet - Everything is good
44. Es isch kei Problem für mich - It's no problem for me
45. Das isch fantastisch - That's fantastic
46. Mir gsehnd üs bald - See you soon
47. Es isch chli schwirig - It's a bit difficult
48. Was isch los? - What's going on?
49. S'isch e lange Wäg - It's a long way
50. Das isch sehr interessant - That's very interesting.
